GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
soc: qcom: ocmem: Fix refcount leak in of_get_ocmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit ed40a48d0a9166edb22e2b8efafea822e93dd79a, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 88c1e9404f1deee02e52d13aae3d9ee2cabd66f5. For more details please see the references link.
